body: LEAD: Friday DIVE-IN MOVIES Friday DIVE-IN MOVIES New Yorkers who longingly remember the pleasures of drive-in movies and who enjoy waterfront entertainment will be happy to learn that the Floating Cinema is in town for the next four weeks.
